entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 1:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: N 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of ice pellets or snow beginning this evening then changing to periods of snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening and after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
